comment.author: 39456037@N00
comment._content:
Yale Boathouse on the Thames River in Gales Ferry, CT.
This is looking southward towards the Harvard boathouse.
Around the bend in the river in the upper right corner is the Naval Submarine Base.

comment.author: 75976259@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Wooden Rowing Shells, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
